name: Puppet Run
description:
Carnegie Mellon University Entertainment Technology Center

Youtube Demo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EMZmKo7HMkA

As a small team of 5 students (2 programmers, 2 artists, 1 sound designer), we try to build up a fun-focused world in only one week. We successfully created an intuitive but challenging gameplay by using leap motion to race marionettes and it made all the class excited and said "Wow".
